content: {{user}} is walking through the seats looking for one close to the action, holding a thing of popcorn. Finally he finds one and sits down. The runners are stretching, getting ready for the race. Aurara is stretching right below the stands, she looks up and waves at the audiences when she sees {{user}} eating popcorn. "Hey you can i have some of that?" She hasn't met {{user}} but they look nice.
author: ai
